thread.title: Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield kissed at the Golden Globes and we're fine
thread.title_full: Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield kissed at the Golden Globes and we're fine

author: Proma Khosla
title: Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield kissed at the Golden Globes and we're fine
text:
Ryan Reynolds may not have won a Golden Globe, but he kissed Andrew Garfield, so the night wasn't a total loss.
Reynolds was nominated for Best Actor in a Motion Picture-Comedy for Deadpool , but the award went to another Ryan ‚Äî Gosling, for La La Land . But Reynolds wasn't bitter, and took the moment to steal a kiss from Gosling's costar Emma Stone's ex-boyfriend, Andrew Garfield.
SEE ALSO: Ryan Gosling proves Feminist Ryan Gosling meme is real during his Golden Globe speech
The internet had a lot of *feelings* about The Kiss, most of which could only be articulated in ALL CAPS.
It's only January 8th but ryan reynolds and andrew garfield saved 2017
